page.title: 15Mobile Library at Notgrove
page.content: The Mobile Library visits fortnightly on a Wednesday and is used by 6 villagers. It is a large blue van from Moreton-in-the-Marsh, with a driver and Librarian, and carries many hundreds of books on all topics from Fiction, Biography, Reference Books, a shelf full of large print book and a box of Childrens books. There is no limit on the number of books borrowed at one time, and books can be kept for several weeks before a reminder is sent. Specific books can be requested, and should it be a popular title with a waiting list, the red lable comes into operation, whereby the book must be returned at the next visit of the Library to enable other readers to have the book without too much delay.
